author: Kristopher Schollmeyer
comment: Best of the photo watch faces that I have found. The time can be moved, resized and color/transparency adjusted to best display your photo and remain useful. I'm using it with an Asus ZenWatch and displaying Halloween wallpapers downloaded from Zedge for the month of October.
title: Works Great

author: René Smeekes
comment: Doesn't work  Choosing a picture doesn't change it on the watch (Huawei Watch)

reply.author: Léo Cacheux
reply.content: Could you give more details about what is not working ? What is your watch ? If there is a problem for some users, I'd like to fix this ASAP.

author: Suresh Mahagedara
comment: Lovely app. Works well with my MOTO 360 2nd gen watch. I will give you a 5 STAR

author: Art Mx
comment: How to open it? The screen only show uninstall

author: Ryan Free
comment: When I chose the photo for the watch face, it just presented with a black screen. Running Android 7.1. Huawei Watch.
title: Huawei Watch issuss
